偏.definition: to lean; to slant; oblique; prejudiced; to deviate from average; to stray from the intended line; stubbornly; contrary to expectations

偏三輪.definition: old-style cycle with lateral third wheel and passenger seat

偏三輪摩托車.pinyin: pian1 san1 lun2 mo2 tuo1 che1

偏低.definition: to be on the low side; to be inadequate (e.g. of a salary)

偏偏.definition: (indicating that sth turns out just the opposite of what one would wish) unfortunately; as it happened; (indicating that sth is the opposite of what would be normal or reasonable) stubbornly; contrarily; against reason; (indicating that sb or a group is singled out) precisely; only; of all people

偏僻.definition: remote; desolate; far from the city

偏利共棲.definition: (biology) to have a commensal relationship with (another organism)

偏利共生.definition: (biology) to have a commensal relationship with (another organism)

偏勞.definition: undue trouble; Thank you for having gone out of your way to help me.

偏向.definition: partial towards sth; to prefer; to incline; erroneous tendencies (Leftist or Revisionist deviation)

偏執.definition: extreme and inflexible; fixated; stubborn in clinging to a notion; (psychology) paranoid

偏好.definition: to have a special liking (for sth)

偏安.definition: content to hold a small part of the territory; fig. forced to relinquish the middle ground; forced to move away

偏寵.definition: to favor; to prefer; to show favoritism

偏巧.definition: by coincidence; it so happened that; fortunately; against expectation

偏廢.definition: to give unequal emphasis to; doing some things at the expense of others

偏待.definition: to show favoritism against sb; to treat unfairly

偏愛.definition: to be partial towards sth; to favor; to prefer; preference; favorite

偏斜.definition: crooked; not upright; diverging from straight line; improper; dishonest

偏旁.definition: component of a Chinese character (as the radical or the phonetic part)

偏正式合成詞.pinyin: pian1 zheng4 shi4 he2 cheng2 ci2

偏疼.definition: to favor a junior; to show favoritism to some juniors

偏癱.definition: paralysis of one side of the body; hemiplegia

偏科.definition: to overemphasize some topic (at the expense of others); overdoing it; to go overboard

偏聽偏信.definition: selective listening; to hear what one wants to hear

偏航.definition: to diverge (from one's bearing, flight path etc); to go off course; to yaw

偏袒.definition: to bare one shoulder; (fig.) to side with; to discriminate in favor of

偏西.definition: inclining to the west (e.g. of the sun after noon, indicating lateness of the day)

偏要.definition: to insist on doing sth; must do it, despite everything

偏角.definition: angle of drift (navigation); deflection (from course); angle of divergence

偏註.definition: to stress in a prejudiced way; to emphasize sth unduly

偏護.definition: to protect a croney; to give unprincipled support

偏轉.definition: deflection (physics); deviation (away from a straight line)

偏轉角.definition: angle of drift (navigation); deflection (from course); angle of divergence

偏重.definition: to stress in a prejudiced way; to emphasize sth unduly

偏鋒.definition: (calligraphy) technique in which the shaft of the brush is held at a low angle, so that the tip of the brush runs along the edge of the stroke (cf. 正鋒|正锋[zheng4feng1] and 側鋒|侧锋[ce4feng1]); (fig.) unorthodox or improper way of doing things

偏門.definition: side door; doing things by the side door (i.e. dishonestly)

偏關.definition: Pianguan county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi

偏關縣.definition: Pianguan county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi

偏離.definition: to deviate; to diverge; to wander

偏題.definition: to go off-topic; to stray from the topic; obscure question; trick exam question; catch question (CL:道[dao4])

偏食.definition: partial to (some kinds of food, usu. unhealthy); having likes and dislikes; partial eclipse

偏高.definition: to be on the high side; to be unusually high
